column5: My place is close to many restaurants and retail stores Target (3 min), Walmart (5 min), etc. Close to highway 75 and SRT 121, providing quick access to highways. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Gorgeous Spacious Home w/ Private Bedroom 1A
